page.title: 07How Ryhope has Changed
page.content: The majority of people in our survey felt that life was better when they were younger. They felt people were more friendly, that there was less violence, and a lot of people said they could leave their doors unlocked and their houses would be safe. Some people did say that things were worse because people were poorer in earlier days. Most people felt that the changes in{Ryhope}were fine. Some people said they missed the pit and the older type of houses. Almost everyone looked back on their{schooldays}with fondness even though a lot of people spoke about how strict their{teachers}were. Most people seemed to think that the only difference between school when they were young and{school}today was the methods used by the teachers.
